projects.name: Telegram Protein Alerts Bot
projects.description: Automated bot that monitors protein supplement prices and sends real-time discount alerts to users via Telegram.
projects.longDescription: A sophisticated automation system that scrapes multiple e-commerce platforms for protein supplement deals, processes pricing data, and delivers personalized notifications to subscribers through Telegram's Bot API. Features include price tracking, threshold alerts, and user preference management.
features: Real-time price monitoring across multiple platforms
challenges: Handling rate limits and anti-bot measures
Ensuring reliable data extraction from dynamic websites
Managing user preferences and notification scheduling

projects.name: E-commerce REST API
projects.description: Scalable REST API for e-commerce platform with advanced features like inventory management and payment processing.
projects.longDescription: A comprehensive backend solution for e-commerce applications built with Node.js and PostgreSQL. Includes user authentication, product catalog management, shopping cart functionality, order processing, and payment integration.
features: Product catalog with search and filtering
challenges: Optimizing database queries for large catalogs

projects.name: Task Manager Application
projects.description: Full-stack task management application with real-time collaboration features.
projects.longDescription: A modern task management solution built with React and Node.js, featuring real-time updates, team collaboration, and project organization. Includes drag-and-drop interfaces, deadline tracking, and notification systems.

projects.name: Portfolio Website
projects.description: Modern, responsive portfolio website built with Next.js and TypeScript.
projects.longDescription: A minimalist portfolio website showcasing projects and experience, built with modern web technologies. Features dark mode, responsive design, and optimized performance.
